Bibliographic References: Recomposed from frr., with small portions missing. Schauenburg, RM 93, 1986, pis. 36 and 37,1. PLATE 110, a, b
Imagery Description: (a) Herakles, wearing lionNon Sepcifiedskin, with club behind him, seated to l., holding jug in r. hand and phiale in l.; in front of him, cornucopia full of cakes, etc.; above, looking down, bust of maenad (?), with fawnNon Sepcifiedskin knotted round throat, (b) young satyr, bending forward, with egg in r., phiale and whiteNon Sepcifieddotted red fillet in l., thyrsus over l. shoulder. The satyr is close to those on the two preceding vases.
